column1: Would you rather have the ability to fly or be invisible?
Would you rather always be 10 minutes late or 20 minutes early?
Would you rather have dinner with your favorite celebrity or favorite historical figure?
Would you rather live without music or live without movies?
Would you rather be able to speak all languages or play all instruments?
Would you rather have unlimited money or unlimited time?
Would you rather live in the mountains or by the ocean?
Would you rather never be able to lie or never be able to tell the truth?
Would you rather have the perfect job or the perfect relationship?
Would you rather be famous or have your best friend be famous?
Would you rather go on a spontaneous weekend trip or plan a week-long vacation together?
Would you rather cook a complicated meal together or order in and watch a movie?
Would you rather share your deepest secret first or your most embarrassing moment first?
Would you rather have a picnic under the stars or a candlelit dinner at home?
Would you rather relive your first date or skip ahead to your last anniversary?
Would you rather always be warm together or always be cool together?
Would you rather communicate only through notes for a day or only through texts for a week?
Would you rather give up social media or give up dessert for a month?
Would you rather adopt a pet together or plant a garden together?
Would you rather dance in the rain or watch a sunrise together?
Would you rather have a partner who always plans surprises or one who asks what you want?
Would you rather spend a year in a small city you both love or travel the world for a year?
Would you rather make a scrapbook of your relationship or create a digital photo album?
Would you rather always celebrate small victories or save up for big celebrations?
Would you rather be able to read each other's thoughts for a minute a day or be able to teleport to each other once a month?
Would you rather always know the exact right thing to say or be able to make your partner laugh anytime?
Would you rather have a partner who is adventurous with food or adventurous with activities?
Would you rather learn a new hobby together or teach each other your favorite hobbies?
Would you rather never argue again but feel distant or argue sometimes and feel close?
Would you rather your partner surprise you with breakfast in bed or plan a surprise date night?
Would you rather write each other letters to open in 10 years or plant a time capsule together?
Would you rather be stuck on a road trip with great music or with great conversation?
Would you rather switch lives with your partner for a day or relive one day together repeatedly?
Would you rather always hold hands in public or always give a kiss on the forehead?
Would you rather share a hobby that consumes weekends or have separate hobbies that you support?
Would you rather your partner be unusually thoughtful or unusually funny?
Would you rather have a quiet night in with board games or go out dancing?
Would you rather take a pottery class together or a cooking class?
Would you rather have a ritual every Sunday morning or every Friday night?
Would you rather learn each other's favorite childhood song or favorite childhood story?
Would you rather celebrate your partner's successes wildly or support them quietly?
Would you rather travel somewhere neither of you has been or return to your favorite shared spot?
Would you rather be the couple everyone thinks is perfect or the couple who is real and raw?
Would you rather receive a playlist made by your partner or write a poem for them?
Would you rather have matching tattoos that mean something or matching heirlooms?
Would you rather be surprised with a thoughtful gift or a planned experience?
Would you rather your partner remember every small detail or surprise you occasionally?
Would you rather face a fear together or teach each other how to overcome smaller fears?
Would you rather spend a day doing everything your partner loves or have them do everything you love?
Would you rather whisper your dreams in bed or shout them on a mountaintop together?
Would you rather give up TV for a month or give up coffee for a month together?
Would you rather have a tiny wedding with a big party later or a big wedding with a quiet honeymoon?
Would you rather spend a winter in a cozy cabin or a summer in a beach house?
Would you rather argue honestly now or avoid conflict and regret it later?
Would you rather create a ritual for apologies or for celebrations?
Would you rather have a partner who's great at planning or great at improvising?
Would you rather make each other mixtapes/playlists for different moods or share one for both?
Would you rather be able to cook any meal perfectly or fix any broken thing around the house?
Would you rather share a shower every morning or a long bath once a week?
Would you rather surprise your partner with a small daily note or one big surprise a year?
Would you rather be known as the funniest couple or the kindest couple?
Would you rather build a home library together or a home full of travel souvenirs?
Would you rather send each other silly memes all day or thoughtful messages occasionally?
Would you rather have a weekly ritual where you both say what you're grateful for or where you set goals together?
Would you rather your partner read to you every night or you read to them?
Would you rather plan a future you both describe in detail or take things as they come?
Would you rather always be on the same page about money or always be spontaneous with spending?
Would you rather share a hobby that creates physical keepsakes or digital memories?
Would you rather try a new cuisine every month or perfect a favorite dish together?
Would you rather give your partner an unforgettable experience or an unforgettable object?
Would you rather be known for your public displays of affection or for your private rituals?
Would you rather have a partner who is very sentimental or one who is very practical?
Would you rather support each other's careers equally or specialize in one while the other supports?
Would you rather face a challenge together and grow or avoid it and stay comfortable?
Would you rather exchange five compliments a day or one deep conversation a week?
Would you rather have slow mornings together or wild late nights together?
Would you rather write your future bucket list together or surprise each other with items over time?
Would you rather experience a year of highs and lows together or steady, predictable months?
Would you rather share your most unrealistic dream or your most realistic fear?
Would you rather be able to go back and change one memory or see one future moment?
Would you rather learn each other's love language and use it or always try new ways to show love?
Would you rather have a shared calendar of dreams or keep them secret until the right moment?
Would you rather ask each other one deep question every day or one silly one every hour?
Would you rather take turns planning the perfect date or plan one together?
Would you rather be able to pause time for five minutes with your partner or rewind one conversation?
Would you rather send your partner a flirty text in public or a heartfelt one in private?
Would you rather tell your partner one thing you regret or one thing you're proud of?
Would you rather build a tradition of annual trips or annual home projects?
Would you rather reveal a childhood crush or a childhood fear to your partner?
Would you rather share a playlist that defines your relationship or a photo album that shows it?
Would you rather commit to learning something new every month together or every year?
Would you rather create a shared map of places you want to go or a list of experiences you want to try?
Would you rather be known as the couple who sings loudly in the car or the couple who cooks together every weekend?
Would you rather have a partner who surprises you with compliments or with acts of service?
Would you rather share your ideal morning routine or your ideal evening routine and try one?
Would you rather rebuild a memory with added fun details or remember it as it was?
Would you rather tell each other the truth even if it hurts or protect each other's feelings with small omissions?
Would you rather keep a shared journal of your days or a shared blog of adventures?
Would you rather plan a surprise reunion with someone meaningful or a surprise date night?
Would you rather say 'I love you' more often or show it through actions more often?
Would you rather watch the sunrise together every day or the sunset together every night?
Would you rather always dream about each other or never have dreams at all?
Would you rather give each other massages every week or cook for each other every week?
Would you rather have a long walk on the beach or a long drive through the countryside?
Would you rather share one giant blanket or always have your own?
Would you rather sing karaoke together or dance in public together?
Would you rather share each other’s childhood toys or childhood journals?
